articles.description: If you visit an IHOP in the not-too-distant future, chances are you may encounter some unexpected menu items that weren't available before: beer, wine and bubbly.
articles.content:
If you visit an IHOP in the not-too-distant future, chances are you may encounter some unexpected menu items that werent available before: beer, wine and bubbly.
